# delegate

**Instance Property**

Specifies the delegate of the sharing service.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any NSSharingServiceDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate class must conform to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSharingServiceDelegate] protocol.

## Managing the Delegate

- **NSSharingServiceDelegate**: A set of methods that you use to customize the position and animation of a share sheet, and to be notified whether the item is successfully shared.
